title: april 27: a papal donation [hosted by: Noah Kahan]
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Noah Kahan talks about Pope Francis’ donation to aid migrants. After, he talks about Keith Richards. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
